thread.section_title: Solid Apollo LED Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solid Apollo LED | solidapollo.com
thread.title: Ivy
thread.title_full: Solid Apollo LED reviewed by Ivy

author: Ivy
title: Ivy
text: On 2 occasions I called this company for advise on their products. On both occasions the gentlemen who answered were beyond helpful and knowledgeable! I needed some lighting for a visual merchandising job I had coming up involving specific size lights as well as a certain color light. I know NOTHING about lighting. I not only got exactly what I needed but the product is amazing as well! They went out of their way to help me as well as teach me what the difference was between the options that would work for me. I stayed on the phone with one person for almost an hour while he made sure that every aspect of my order was correct and that I would receive it on time! He went and spoke to production for me to rush the order with no cost to me. I felt really taken care of. I appreciate this company and it's employees so very much! I will recommend this company to anyone & everyone who needs lighting!
